attributes.action: Partition 7 new British Crown Dependencies out of UK and EU; keeping UK in EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Full Petition Text & Detailed List of the 7 new BCDs' areas (with % Leave vote figures): http://tinyurl.com/ntg88ta
Maps of 7 BCDs: 
http://tinyurl.com/orygvny 
http://tinyurl.com/ogb3qnk
Further:
UK Govt to assign finance & civil servants to help each of new BCDs get its Govt / Parliament set up.
Defence still by UK; major roads, rail, power grids & nuclear reactors stay UK territory; later on BCDs contribute finances. 
Reciprocal NHS Arrangement between BCDs & UK (like Isle of Man & UK now).
attributes.background:
Partition 7 new British Crown Dependencies out of UK and EU so Leavers can Leave EU. Keep post-Partition UK a full EU member state (do not activate Art.50) so Remainers can Remain in EU.
Precedents: Isle of Man, Jersey & Guernsey are BCDs outside EU.
When Greenland left Denmark, Denmark stayed EU
